description: Schema for metadata/<groupId>/<artifactId>/index.json. Each entry describes a metadata bundle for a range of library versions.

metadata-version.description: Subdirectory name where the metadata files for this entry reside, e.g. '7.1.0.Final'.

tested-versions.description: Explicitly tested upstream library versions that this metadata is known to support.

test-version.description: Overrides 'metadata-version' for use in test directories. This allows one metadata entry to share tests defined for a different version's metadata directory.

latest.description: Marks this entry as the latest/default metadata for currently supported versions.

default-for.description: Java regular expression describing the version range for which this entry should be used by default (e.g. '7\\.1\\..*').

override.description: When true, expresses the intent to exclude outdated built-in metadata shipped with Native Image for the matched versions.

allowed-packages.description: Packages expected to contain metadata entries for this library. Used by CI checks.

skipped-versions.description: Versions explicitly excluded from support, each with a reason.

requires.description: List of dependent modules (group:artifact) whose metadata is required at runtime.

skipped-versions.reason: Dependency io.opentelemetry:opentelemetry-api:1.34.0 provides reflect-config.json which does not parse.
